name: Poisoned Maze
description:
A game made specifically for theBatya Game Jam 2021. A simple maze puzzle game. You must find four crystals in each level and return them to the fire in order to proceed further.

Developers:

Fedorych Volodymyr (Klirik#9426), Maks Semenyaka (Maks Semenyaka#2838), Krushinsky Kirill (Zell#7810)
